TopicTitle: CoL / CoD change with breaking ground?

Articles.Content:
Hi all

Did the centre of lift / drag on the mark 1 capsule change with the new DLC?

 

Started a new save, and the capsule seems extremely unstable on reentry. The CoD is below the CoM, so on reentry it wants to flip, which is the converse of how the capsule shape is supposed to function (i.e passively stable, heat shield down.)

 

Anyone else seeing this?

 

ES

For anyone interested, looks like an old bug has been reintroduced whereby CoM sits in the wrong place. Lovely.
